Name: Intimidatie
Text: Choose an enemy at melee range - this turn they get -1 init -1 mv

Name: Fast Thinking
Text: When placed, put an extra card from your hand down - that card resolves at +1 init -1 mv

Name: Transform
Text: Until the end of your next turn, this frame's ranged attcks get +4 range and +1 dmg, and this frame gets -1 mv

Name: Agile response
Text: After each attach recieved this turn, move 2

Name: Fakeout
Text: When this card resolves, look at the top two cards of your deck, choose one and apply that instead

Name: Combo Strike
Text: \footnotesize{When revealed, choose 2 of the top 3 cards of the deck and discard them - this card gains the sum of their movement, blocks and attacks}
